segments.text: Hello . I'm Duty Manager today ; you wanted to speak to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I hope you can help . I'm interested in obtaining a Working Capital Loan . So , I was wondering what you offer here ? Do you have various types ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Sir . We can provide these loans in both local and foreign currency , Temporary Working Capital Loans , Short-term Working Capital Loans and Mid-term Working Capital Loans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I'm not exactly sure what we require just now .
segments.speaker: S2
